code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,CheckSquare,Zap,BarChart3,LogOut,User}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=_ref=>{let{user,onLogout}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{path:'/',icon:Home,label:'Dashboard'},{path:'/tasks',icon:CheckSquare,label:'Tasks'},{path:'/nudges',icon:Zap,label:'Nudges'},{path:'/stats',icon:BarChart3,label:'Stats'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-brand",children:"\uD83D\uDE80 Micro Motivation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-user-name",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-user-stats",children:[user.streak," day streak \u2022 ",user.total_points," points"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onLogout,className:"nav-logout",title:"Logout",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogOut,{size:20})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mobile-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mobile-nav-items",children:navItems.map(item=>{const Icon=item.icon;const isActive=location.pathname===item.path;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"mobile-nav-item ".concat(isActive?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.label})]},item.path);})})})]});};export default Navigation;
